trans-unit.source: Defines the modes in which classes derived from <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingFunctionBase"></xref> perform their easing.
trans-unit.target: Define os modos nos quais classes derivadas de <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingFunctionBase"> </xref> executar seus atenuação.

trans-unit.source: The following graphs demonstrate the different values of <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingFunctionBase.EasingMode%2A>, where *f*(*t*) represents the animation progress and *t* represents time.
trans-unit.target: Os gráficos a seguir demonstram os diferentes valores de <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingFunctionBase.EasingMode%2A>, onde *f*(*t*) representa o progresso de animação e *t* representa a hora.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingFunctionBase.EasingMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: ![SineEase for different EasingMode values](~/add/media/sineease-graph.png "SineEase for different EasingMode values") ## XAML Attribute Usage ``` ```
trans-unit.target: ![SineEase para diferentes valores de EasingMode](~/add/media/sineease-graph.png "SineEase para diferentes valores de EasingMode") # # uso do atributo XAML ``` ```

trans-unit.source: Interpolation follows the mathematical formula associated with the easing function.
trans-unit.target: Interpolação segue a fórmula matemática associada à função de easing.

trans-unit.source: Interpolation uses EaseIn for the first half of the animation and EaseOut for the second half.
trans-unit.target: Interpolação usa EaseIn para a primeira metade da animação e EaseOut para a segunda metade.

trans-unit.source: Interpolation follows 100% interpolation minus the output of the formula associated with the easing function.
trans-unit.target: Interpolação segue interpolação de 100% menos a saída da fórmula associada à função de easing.
